name: Salmon Soup
description: Finnish Salmon Soup, or Lohikeitto, is a simple Nordic salmon chowder and a comforting 30 minute meal made with a light cream broth, melt-in-your-mouth chunks of salmon, and tons of fresh dill!

name: Butter Chicken
description: If there’s any Indian recipe that’s worth making at home, its Butter Chicken, and this is the best butter chicken you’ll make! Serve over basmati rice and garlic naan bread.

name: Banana Bread
description: This banana bread recipe creates the most delicious, moist loaf with loads of banana flavor. Why compromise the banana flavor? Friends and family love my recipe and say it's by far the best! It tastes wonderful toasted. Enjoy!

name: Banana Split
description: In 1904, the first banana split recipe was made in Pennsylvania by David Strickler, an apprentice pharmacist at a local drug store.

name: Tomato Soup
description: Adding parmesan and heavy cream makes it so satisfying and balances the acidity. It’s also a quick and easy 30-minute soup that keeps well in the fridge.

name: Greek Salad
description: This easy Greek salad recipe is our new favorite summer side dish! Just 7 ingredients + a simple Greek salad dressing make it refreshing & delicious.

name: Tiramisu
description: Tiramisu is one of the most famous Italian dessert in the world, born in Treviso (a lovely town near Venice), delicious and easy to make. There are many variations of the tiramisu recipe. The following is the authentic Italian tiramisu recipe, the one you make on Sundays, the one you eat when you come to Italy, made with eggs and mascarpone cheese.

name: Mozzarella Caprese
description: Mozzarella Caprese celebrates the art of combining a handful of the finest ingredients to create a symphony of taste and texture. Whether enjoyed as an appetizer, a light lunch, or a stunning side dish, this dish is a vibrant tribute to the sun-kissed Mediterranean flavors that continue to captivate taste buds around the world.

name: Pad Thai
description: Embark on a culinary adventure with Pad Thai, the beloved Thai dish that effortlessly weaves together a tapestry of tastes and textures. Experience the captivating interplay of tender rice noodles, succulent shrimp or chicken, crunchy bean sprouts, and earthy peanuts, all harmoniously united in a sweet and tangy tamarind-infused sauce.

name: Miso Soup

name: Peanut protein shake
description: Whether you're looking to refuel after an intense training session or seeking a way to boost your daily protein intake, the Peanut Protein Shake is a great ally on your wellness journey. Embrace the fusion of taste and nutrition as you sip your way to vitality, celebrating the union of wholesome ingredients that power your body and tantalize your taste buds.
